get.description: Lists all of the Front Doors within a resource group under a subscription.

default.description: Front Door error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new Front Door with a Front Door name under the specified subscription and resource group.

parameters.description: Front Door properties needed to create a new Front Door.
parameters.name: frontDoorParameters

201.description: Created. The request has been fulfilled and a new Front Door has been created.

202.description: Accepted. The request has been accepted for processing and the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Front Door error response describing why the operation failed.
